Articles.Content: So IRL if you can get into orbit you can get lots of money and science, but in ksp if you do that only around 3 times you lose all science from the experiments youve done and you dont gaint anything. So i wanna see if there's a mod to change that. So you can do things 100 times and get at least a little out of it. It will decrease but still remain kind of high. But if you have gone to jool and back n' amazing stuff then it will be worth MUCH less. Just an idea if anyon want to make it
